name: test_e2e_with_logs[286_NOSQL_MONGO_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `NOSQL_MONGO_003` |
| **Name** | MongoDB $gt operator bypass |
| **Category** | NOSQL_EXTENDED |
| **Subcategory** | mongodb |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{"password": {"$gt": ""}}`
- **Encoded**: `%7B%22password%22%3A%20%7B%22%24gt%22%3A%20%22%22%7D%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~6000ms
- **Timestamp**: 03:14:42.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=NOSQL_MONGO_003-1767842082890-uo37wc pattern_id=NOSQL_MONGO_003 uri=/?q=%7B%22password%22%3A%20%7B%22%24gt%22%3A%20%22%22%7D%7D client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
03:14:42.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=NOSQL_MONGO_003-1767842082890-uo37wc pattern_id=NOSQL_MONGO_003 uri=/?q=%7B%22password%22%3A%20%7B%22%24gt%22%3A%20%22%22%7D%7D client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
